name: MPSNNPadding
desc: The protocol that provides a description of how kernels should pad images.

class MPSImage
items.desc: A texture that may have more than four channels for use in convolutional neural networks.

items.name: class MPSState
items.desc: An opaque data container for large storage in MPS CNN filters.

items.name: class MPSKernel
items.desc: A standard interface for Metal Performance Shaders kernels.

items.name: class MPSImageDescriptor
items.desc: A description of the attributes used to create an MPSImage.
